description: Jade handle with monster-mask design; incised on both sides identically; interrupted carved outline; the perforation is drilled from both sides. Ivory calcified jade with blue striation. Traces of red pigment and clay.
text: This ornate jade fitting takes the form of a crouching dragon seen in profile. The flanged outline and stylized decor is characteristic of many Shang bone and bronze artifacts.
title: Handle
